metadata.title: YukiniYa Kids Winter Gloves for Boys Men Anti-Slip Warm Soft Fleece Touch Screen for Running Driving Cycling Working Hiking
features: Thick&Warm Material: Flannel fluff material & premium Dacron. Lightweight warm three-layer fabric, windproof and thin polyester shell, lined with soft and thermal TR cotton keep your hands warm enough from cold days.

Anti-slip Humanized Design: Coming with enough anti-slip on the palm and fingers and wear-resistant PU provides better grip on the palm of the glove. And there are reflection patterns on the back of the gloves.It can reflect light and improve the safety of cycling at night.

Water Resistant & Windproof: High-quality water resistant shell keeps your hands dry in snow or light rain with a waterproof TPU component, keeping freezing wind and cold water off your skin. Please note that the fabric of shell is waterproof, but it is not suitable for dipping gloves into water for a long time because the seams and tips of the thumb and index finger is not waterproof.

High Sensitivity Touchscreen:The gloves adopted conductive material on the thumb, index and middle finger. You can texting, typing, play games, click smart watch and GPS panel of cars freely without with no need for taking off gloves in the cold weather.

Suitable for family daily use: The winter gloves can be used when walking in the street, biking to work, running in cold conditions, riding motorcycle in snow, driving, hiking and in other outdoor activities for men boys gilrs women. Great gift for your kids, lovers, family and parent.
description: YukiniYa boys mens Winter gloves perfect for your hands and warm up for outdoor activities!

The gloves are made of 240g Polar Fleece as the main fabric, Polyester as the auxiliary fabric, Microfiber for the palm, 120g Thermal Cotton + Water resistant TPU + Firm Sponge + Insulated Cotton inside, windproof elastic soft long Wrist, which is superior warmth, durable, water-resistant, windproof.

1. Soft & Warm 2. Waterproof & Windproof 3. 3 Fingers dual-layer touchscreen keep your hands warm without taking off the gloves 4. Anti-Slip, let you grip any tool firmly 5. Elastic wrist & soft long cuff protect you from cold and lock the warm 6. Convenient plastic buckles convenient for you to bring with you
The fabric of shell is waterproof, but it is not suitable for dipping gloves into water because the seams and tips of the thumb and index finger is not waterproof.
